title: account hacked
body: my account has been hacked. people have refunded my prior RP purchases to gift themselves skins. I have changed my email and password but I am still out substantial hard earned money. In my account I can see who received these gifts but I don't how to contact riot to have this reversed if it can be reversed. and if this cant be will riot restore my account back to before it was compromised. giving me back my RP purchases and RP balance. or banning these players and give me complementary RP to refund my Purchases. I can give riot the user names and a list of what was stolen/taken. please help me because I don't know how to resolve this. advice needed.                       thanks and make sure your accounts are secure.

replies.body:
Hello shadowdeath4!

We need you to get your account back ASAP.  The best way to do this is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our Account Recovery Specialists can respond and help out.  Remember, include as much information about your account as possible so that we can verify that you're the original owner.

If we can clearly see that your account was compromised, we can reset any of the changes made to your account while it was compromised.

Hopefully we can get this sorted out soon!
